Burning Hammer: Yeah, heheheheh, your right. I'm wanted on every planet I've
gone to, though, for assassinating world leaders. Without even one scar.
Well, except for one, I cut myself as a kid, but I deserved it, I was trying
to see what would happen if I cut myself with a knife. But how I wish I had
of killed that crying kid, I think I'll regret it the rest of my life...
----- Original Message -----
From: <Rudra656@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, November 25, 2000 7:47 PM
Subject: Re: Assassin and Llama


> ::Lambda::
>     She stops walking and stares at him.  "Thank you.  And no I don't
think
> you're demonic.  There were many times when I wanted to kill my family.  I
> never did exactly.  Although they are all dead.  The first to go was my
> brother who died in a horrible accident.  I was very angry at my family by
> then and I convinced my mother it was her fault.  She eventually committed
> suicide.  My father followed shortly there after.  Did I mention I was
only
> an adolescent by that time?"  She smiles at him and says "But hey let's
not
> talk about our pasts, considering the fact that we are in our own pasts."
>
>
>
>
